section.title: Appointment of Company
section.content: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, BRIGHTCAST wishes to engage Company to provide the Services set out herein.

section.title: Services
section.content: The “Services” to be performed by Company shall mean the following:

subsection.title: 2a
subsection.content: Company is the media buyer and is being granted permission by BRIGHTCAST to make media buys for BRIGHTCAST and/or approved affiliates of BRIGHTCAST. Ad spend targets must be mutually agreed upon in writing...

subsection.title: 2b
subsection.content: Site visitors will be directed by Company to landing pages that are mutually agreed upon with BRIGHTCAST...

subsection.title: 2c
subsection.content: Company will be responsible for contributing and/or funding the money for the ad spends on behalf of BRIGHTCAST.

subsection.title: 3a
subsection.content: Revenue generated from ad spends shall be owed and paid by Oath to BRIGHTCAST pursuant to the Oath Agreement...

subsection.title: 3b
subsection.content: BRIGHTCAST will provide Company with 24/7 access to a proprietary revenue reporting platform...

section.title: Revenue Share Fees
section.content: BRIGHTCAST will pay to Company a revenue share of eighty-five percent (85%)...

section.title: Clawbacks
section.content: Fees paid to BRIGHTCAST under the Oath Agreement with respect to poor quality traffic...

section.title: Availability; Changes
section.content: During the Term, Company agrees to use reasonable effort to maintain, at all times, the operation and availability of the Company’s Services...

section.title: Full Disclosure
section.content: Company agrees to provide BRIGHTCAST with full visibility into the buying tactics...

section.title: Oath & Verizon Media Group Policies, Updates, and Requirements
section.content: BRIGHTCAST and Company agree to adhere to Oath’s and Verizon Media Group’s written policies...

section.title: Traffic Quality
section.content: All traffic must adhere to traffic quality targets of 7 for desktop and 5 for mobile...

section.title: Confidentiality
section.content: Company and BRIGHTCAST shall each hold the Confidential Information of the other Party in trust and confidence...

definition.title: Confidential Information
definition.content: Any and all information, business practices, or proprietary materials not generally known...

section.title: Intellectual Property
section.content: Company acknowledges and agrees that BRIGHTCAST or its licensors are the sole owners of all BRIGHTCAST Intellectual Property...

section.title: No Warranty
section.content: NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS...

section.title: Limitation of Liability
section.content: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHALL EITHER PARTY BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES...

section.title: Indemnification
section.content: Each party will indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against any claims or actions...

section.title: Business Conduct
section.content: During the Term, each Party shall maintain high standards of professionalism...

section.title: Term and Termination
section.content: The term of this Agreement shall begin the Effective Date and continue until terminated...

section.title: Dispute Resolution
section.content: The parties will attempt in good faith to resolve informally any disputes or disagreements...

section.title: Force Majeure
section.content: Neither party will be liable or in default for delays or failures in performance resulting from acts of God...

section.title: Non-exclusive Relationship
section.content: BRIGHTCAST and Company are entering into a non-exclusive commercial relationship...

section.title: No Assignment
section.content: Neither party shall have the right to assign or subcontract any obligations under this Agreement...

section.title: Construction
section.content: The section headings in this Agreement are for convenience of reference only...

section.title: Governing Law
section.content: The laws of the state of California will govern all disputes arising out of this Agreement...

section.title: Notices
section.content: Notices or other communications shall be in writing and sufficient if delivered personally...

contact.name: Brightcast LLC
contact.address: 2699 Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 200, Hermosa Beach, CA 90254

section.title: Independent Contractors
section.content: The parties are independent contractors and will have no power or authority to assume...

section.title: Modification; Waiver
section.content: No provisions of this Agreement may be modified or waived unless agreed in writing...

section.title: Severability
section.content: If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid or unenforceable...

section.title: Counterparts
section.content: This Agreement may be executed in counterparts, each of which will be deemed an original...

section.title: Electronic Signatures
section.content: The Parties agree that electronic signatures may be utilized for execution of this Agreement...

section.title: Entire Agreement
section.content: This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding of the Parties...
